subject: "Error Rate %" shows no data on "Ops Overview" (Checkout project)

comment.body: Since last week the "Error Rate %" widget on the "Ops Overview" dashboard shows an empty chart. Filters are env=prod. The widget reads from metric m_error_rate. Is the metric receiving recent samples?
I used to see the Checkout project and the "Ops Overview" dashboard, but they do not show up anymore. Email: elliot@acme.com
I am trying to open the "Ops Overview" dashboard under project Checkout but cannot find it. Email: taylor@acme.com, dashboard: Ops Overview, project: Checkout
